com.mancas.database

Class DBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mancas.database.DBHelper

  • public class DBHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class that contains useful methods to manage Educacity SQLite database
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Manuel Casas Barrado

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  DBHelper.AsyncGetDatabase
      Private class that provide an asynchronous task to get a writable database
      class  DBHelper.AsyncInsert
      Private class that provide an asynchronous task to insert entries into database
      class  DBHelper.AsyncSelect
      Private class that provide an asynchronous task to insert entries into database
      class  DBHelper.AsyncUpdate
      Private class that provide an asynchronous task to update entries
      static interface  DBHelper.DBHelperCallback
      Callback interface used to listen for database events from asynchronous tasks
      static class  DBHelper.DBOpenHelper
      Helper class to manage database creation and upgrade

      • createNewAccount

        public long createNewAccount(int id,
                             java.lang.String email,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String profile_image)
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                             java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Creates a new Educacity account
        Parameters:
        email - the email of the user has used to register a new Educacity account
        name - the name of the user
        profile_image - path to the image file of the account
        Returns:
        the new account ID
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the asynchronous task that perform the database opening work has been interrupted
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - if the asynchronous task that perform the database opening work has crashed

      • getProfileImageId

        public long getProfileImageId()
        Deprecated. use AppUtils.getAccountImageID(Context) instead
        Returns:
        the current profile image ID or -1 if there is no profile image

      • getProfileImagePath

        public java.lang.String getProfileImagePath(DBTaskQuery task)
        Gets the current profile image path
        Parameters:
        task - an instance of DBTaskQuery that contains the necessary data to perform a database query
        Returns:
        the current profile image path or an empty string if no image is found

      • getProfileName

        public java.lang.String getProfileName(DBTaskQuery task)
        Gets the current profile name
        Parameters:
        task - an instance of DBTaskQuery that contains the necessary data to perform a database query
        Returns:
        the current profile name or an empty string if no image is found
